description: Create a medical shift tracking dashboard with professional healthcare aesthetic. Include navigation with logo area, user profile section, and main menu items for Dashboard, Plantões (shifts), Financeiro (financial), and Calendário (calendar)

Build a comprehensive calendar view similar to Google Calendar that displays scheduled shifts. Calendar should show month view with ability to add, edit, and view shift details. Each shift should display time, location, and payment status
Create a shift registration system where users can add new shifts with fields for: date, start/end time, location/hospital, specialty, shift type, and payment amount. Include form validation

Build a financial overview dashboard showing total received, total pending, and upcoming payments. Display this with clear visual cards and include a detailed transactions list showing shift date, location, amount, and payment status (received/pending)
Create interactive charts for financial data visualization: monthly income bar chart, payment status pie chart (received vs pending), and income trend line chart over time
Implement data persistence using browser localStorage so shift data, payments, and calendar entries are saved between sessions
Make the entire application fully responsive for mobile, tablet, and desktop use with professional medical/healthcare color scheme

Fix the Próximos Plantões section showing incorrect month - when user adds a shift in February, it's displaying as January. This is likely a month indexing issue (0-based vs 1-based). Correct the date handling to show the accurate month

Add filter controls to the calendar view with dropdowns for Hospital and Especialidade. Filters should show all unique hospitals and specialties from existing shifts, with an 'Todos' option. When filters are applied, only matching shifts should appear in the calendar and upcoming shifts list
Apply exact text content changes: In src/web/components/layout/sidebar.tsx at line 66, change 'MedShifts' to 'MedPlantão'. At line 67, change 'Gestão de Plantões' to 'Gestão de Plantões Médicos'
Apply exact text content change: In src/web/components/layout/sidebar.tsx at line 105, change 'Dr. Médico' to 'Dr. Danillo Lobo'
